name: Exegesis
description:
Uncover the mysteries of time itself in an ethereal clock tower. Turn reality on its head to explore this eternity. Inspired by numerous philosophical writings, Exegesis interprets Nietzsche's texts on eternal recurrence as interactive media expressing a philosophical thought as a physical space.
